ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Exception from ExtractHTML
ygData.msgSnippet: I ask because I believe this may be an issue specific to JDK 1.6 on Windows. See JIRA issue: http://webteam.archive.org/jira/browse/HER-661 - Gordon @ IA

I ask because I believe this may be an issue specific to JDK 1.6 on 
Windows. See JIRA issue:

   http://webteam.archive.org/jira/browse/HER-661

- Gordon @ IA

Gordon Mohr wrote:
> What OS are you using?
> 
> - Gordon @ IA
>

>>
